reviews.text:
I ordered catering for the office in trays on 9/13 â€” everything was delicious and fresh.
The pitas were really tasty, and they have some of the best falafel Iâ€™ve ever had!

Best kosher pizza store in brooklyn.I appreciate the staff.They all work as a family, and they all do it together.And I was really impressed with the customer service.The two amazing guys that run this store and also all the staff together were amazing in every single way.Had a great experience.I enjoyed my food.Everything was delicious if I am going to rate this restaurant.I'm going to rate it 10 plus great customer service, great management. And everybody. A part of this restaurant is fantastic in every way. And they all have one thing in common. Everybody who works in the front to the back of the restaurant. Teamwork makes a dream work. I'm really impressed, thank you. And only blessings keep up the good work and it makes me feel comfortable. Everyone's chilled out relaxed and they're all here for each otherğŸ˜ŠğŸ‘

My family made a sheva brachos last night 10/21/25 the presentation was beautiful The Food was DELICIOUS  the staff were great and a lot of food
Thank you  kaipera

The food was ok, but very low end. For $20 the baked ziti should be more than pasta with sauce and a drop of cheese sprinkled on top. Make the effort to add cheese throughout and not overbake it. The pizza was also not great.
We arrived on Saturday, lots of people and reservations. They made a mistake with the reservations, the non-Jewish employees seem to be running the place.

Best kosher Pizza in Brooklyn!! Hands down! Also nice vibes!! Also very excellent eggplant
Parmesan!
Good selection of pizza
Clean environment and delicious food

I had falafel and a slice of pizza at Kai Pera, and I was so impressed. Food was amazing, interior is stunning, and service can get a little slower if it's crowded, but it's usually pretty quick. Overall great store, and I definitely would come back again!
ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»ğŸ‘ŒğŸ» Defenilty recommend
All the food at Kai Pera was delicious!
Nice outing with my daughter. Good food.
Came to Kai Pera with My Extended family the whole experience from begining to end was 5 Star plus! From the waiter to the food- Top Notch service!
Amazing food great service !!
Recently redesigned.  Upbeat music is not too loud. Attentive service.  Lots of room. Good experience
Good food in a great location. Highly recommend!!

Looks and feels like a pizza place but the food tastes way better! We got paninis, soup, milkshakes and a deep dish pizza and it was all really delicious! My husband said the deep dish was one of the best he ever had. Then for dessert, we ordered the banana split - they didnâ€™t have bananas but the owner overheard and said itâ€™s not a problem, theyâ€™ll go buy bananas and make it right away! It was THE BEST banana split we ever had. Parking on Ave J is not easy but after the food and service were so agreed, we all agreed it was worth it and weâ€™d definitely go back!
Amazing pizza and food
Food is yummy. My son loves this place. Pleasant atmosphere.

Amazing place, good food, perfect location, perfect timing - they're open late, JUST DO NOT USE WAZE TO GET THERE YOU WILL END UP IN CONCORDVILLE BROOKLYN NEW YORK (this is actually the reason why I left this review) I used Waze to get there and ended up somewhere in Mars, I don't know where that place was but it's 20 minutes away from the restaurant, so I put in the address in Google maps and I made the effort to go there, cuz it pays, believe me it pays, they have good food, they're open late, and they are not expensive. And I'm the kind of guy that does not leave good reviews on restaurants, so if I did believe me it pays.
The food is amazing and the new reconstruction was effective. I also appreciate the music. I was always a customer and I always will be!
Great food great service

Our family had a great time. Service was very courteous. Food was great. Place so clean and pleasant. Very nice ambiance.
Highly recommended!!!

Great food.
Beautiful seating area.
We really enjoyed!

So much potential for this place...I want them to do well...we are tired of the same pizza chain stores around town. But thier service truly sucks. I was confused if it was a restaurant or a basic pizza shop and was told it was a restaurant...We asked for water for the table and never got so i paid for bottle water instead......thier smoothie machine was broken. Thier instagram pictures look  sooo much more delicious then in real life. Their pizza was great the falafel was delish...the penne wasn't too good at all....my homemade one is better  everything took a while to get to the table. Love that the store is big and spacious and clean....I would deffinetly give them another chance and hope for a better time with my kids.
This place has such good food. We recently discovered it and keep coming back!
Best customer service super friendly and awesome food!!
Amazing food great customer service
Great vibes

fun Vibes very good food
Would definitely recommend it

poor customer service. they botch everything,
come to your table 10 times to apologize and still mess up. good food though. fancy, but doesnt justify
Very nice place! Great food!
Really clean and spacious  , fast service  ,  all the food was great and very fresh
Great food, super fast service, overall 10/10!!

Thank you, Tzvika!!!
Amazing service, on every detail. We are looking forward to our next visit to your fine dining establishment.
We came for a birthday and were so impressed. Food is amazing and service was great.
Great food great service! Huge menu lots to choose from all at very fair prices!
Good service, good food will visit again!!
was here at a party food was delicious atmosphere was so calm and service was a++ would definitely return again great for partyâ€™s and sheva brochos

Made a party and the food was out of this world
Service was amazing will pick this place again

Delicious pizza and excellent service!

#pizzacrawl2024
Food and customer service was awesome
Great pizza

I came here to celebrate my sonâ€™s birthday with family. I was so pleasantly surprised by how good this place is. Their food was delicious with generous portion sizes and shockingly good prices. I donâ€™t remember the last time I ordered a pasta dish for only $20.
The food was so so good.
Our favourites were:
Sweet sriracha cauliflower
All the soups - just all of them
Basil cream dream
Garlic oregano cheese crust pizza
Haloumi salad
Sweet potato & feta salad

Desserts were delicious as well. I personally would have liked to see some more chocolate or peanut butter based desserts other than the classic souffle and cheesecake

Service was great. Thank you so much to the chefs and wait staff for being so accommodating and friendly and showering our birthday boy with all the attention.

I highly recommend this place.
Just redone, absolutely beautiful. Great service. Delicious food. Highly recommend.
Very tasty food clean place and respectful people quick service
New place really good nice size plates

Came here on Motzei Shabbat with my good friend Justin (pictured). The pizza was 10/10 and it was fresh from the oven. Would recommend asking for it well done bc although the flop was great there wasnâ€™t that good undercarriage crisp.

UPDATE: they close earlier than listed on Saturday nights
Friendly staff, clean and fresh foods! Highly reccomend!

Amazing food and incredible service!!! Haven't enjoyed a dairy reataurant like that in a while... everything was fresh, even the cookie placed on top of the delicious (torino) milkshake! The prices are the lowest i've seen for this type of restaurant and overall it was a great experience. would definitely go back!

I recently attended an event, and while the food was absolutely delicious, what truly stood out was the care and love put into every aspect of the experience. Each dish wasnâ€™t just prepared with creativity and flavor, but also with an attention to detail that made the service exceptional. You could feel how much they value making everything perfect, from the way the food was presented to the warmth of the staff. They went above and beyond to ensure everyone felt special.

Just walked into this place for the first time and all I can say is OMG! The  mushroom shakshuka was absolutely delicious. The staff are patient and friendly. The atmosphere is relaxing and the decor is fresh and modern. All this for a moderate price. This will be my new favorite  spot!
Food is delicious, service is top rate.  Smiles on all employees, absolutely reasonable pricing!   Beautiful vibe.  I think I covered all the bases, I am totally and absolutely coming back!
The place is amazing!! The stuff is so friendly and the food is great!!! Highly recommend!!
An amazing pizza place!!! Very tasty and everything fresh. I ordered a white pizza slice and an eggplant slice and it came out amazing. Will be coming back
Mazal has brought her trademark perfection to Flatbush.  Her attention to detail and mouthwatering presentation is overshadowed by the tastiness of the dishes.   We wish her the best of luck.
Kai Pera is a great place to grab a quick bite. From casual to fancy dining, their menu is broad and delicious!
They remodeled and I have to say itâ€™s absolutely beautiful, the food is amazing, Itâ€™s clean, the staff is incredible. Love it.
Everything was delicious, especially the sweet siracha cauliflower! Our server was also great!
The place is amazing. The atmosphere is relaxing and nice. The food is delicious
Great food, a very nice environment!

The food was very yummy.
My friend and I would so come back
